Project Setup / Governance.description: Baseline SAC with SD&T governance and agree applicable criteria.
prompts: Has the SAC baseline been created and agreed?
Which governance gates apply to this project?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: No clear acceptance criteria; risk of late surprises at go-live.

Project Setup / Governance.description: Produce & approve PID/Brief with scope, objectives, initial risks.
prompts: Is the PID/Brief approved with scope and objectives?
Are initial risks documented?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Unclear scope and objectives causing misalignment and delays.

Project Setup / Governance.description: Identify risks, update Risk Register, liaise with Operational Risk team.
prompts: Is the risk register up to date?
Has Operational Risk reviewed key risks and mitigations?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Unmanaged risks may materialise during transition or operations.

Project Setup / Governance.description: Confirm high-level SLAs from SoW or contracts.
prompts: Are SLAs/OLAs/penalties clear and accepted?
Do SLAs align to business criticality?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Inability to enforce performance or meet expectations.

Project Setup / Governance.description: Required security or compliance clearances in place.
prompts: Do all staff have required clearances?
Any pending renewals or expiries?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Staff unable to access systems or data; delays to delivery.

Project Setup / Governance.description: All delivery and support staff funded, identified, and allocated.
prompts: Are roles staffed and funded?
Do we have cover plans and backfills?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Key tasks slip; knowledge gaps at go‑live.

Project Setup / Governance.description: Map delivery and operational roles (RACI where needed).
prompts: Is the RACI agreed for delivery and BAU?
Any overlaps or gaps in ownership?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Ambiguity on ownership causes delays and weak controls.

prompts: Is training budget approved and accessible?
Who tracks utilisation and outcomes?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Teams unprepared to support the service post go‑live.

prompts: Is the methodology agreed and understood?
Are governance ceremonies and gates defined?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Misaligned ways of working create planning and quality issues.

Project Setup / Governance.description: Ensure the project plan includes gates and acceptance checkpoints.
prompts: Are acceptance checkpoints and entry/exit criteria in the plan?
Are dependencies and lead times realistic?
Project Setup / Governance.riskIfMissing: Readiness criteria not achieved before go‑live.

Design & Service Setup.description: High-level/architectural solution design circulated for review and approval.
prompts: Has the OSD been reviewed and approved?
Are integrations and major risks documented?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Architecture gaps or misaligned assumptions drive rework.

Design & Service Setup.description: Detailed, low-level 'as-built' infrastructure design reviewed and approved.
prompts: Is the IDS complete and traceable to the OSD?
Have security and capacity requirements been embedded?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Build/configuration deviates from architecture or policy.

Design & Service Setup.description: Accessibility, DR, ITSCM, scalability, resilience, NFRs captured and testable.
prompts: Are NFRs measurable and aligned to business criticality?
Who signs off compliance to NFRs?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Service cannot meet resilience, security, or performance expectations.

Design & Service Setup.description: Ownership, scope, dependencies, and interfaces documented.
prompts: Is scope/ownership crystal clear?
Are upstream/downstream dependencies documented?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Support and reporting gaps post go‑live.

Design & Service Setup.description: Defined and understood (e.g., SIAM), including handoffs and OLAs.
prompts: Are responsibilities and handoffs agreed across teams/vendors?
Are OLAs documented and accepted?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Unclear ownership reduces accountability and increases MTTR.

prompts: What tier is agreed and why?
Do SLAs and support hours align with tiering?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Mis-tiering leads to under/over-provisioning of support and resilience.

prompts: Are business and supplier hours aligned?
Is OOH support and on-call confirmed?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Coverage gaps cause extended outages and SLA breaches.

Design & Service Setup.description: Raise SIA; assess service criticality and business impact.
prompts: Are impacts to existing services assessed and mitigated?
Are comms and change plans aligned to impacts?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Downstream service degradation or compliance impacts.

Design & Service Setup.description: Hosting location, provider, and support model agreed.
prompts: Where is it hosted and who supports infra vs. app vs. ops?
Are costs and responsibilities clear?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Availability/supportability undermined by unclear hosting model.

Design & Service Setup.description: Document capacity requirements and availability targets.
prompts: Are capacity assumptions modelled and monitored?
Do targets align with SLAs and tiering?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Performance shortfalls or unplanned scaling costs.

Design & Service Setup.description: Capture ongoing OPEX (licence, maintenance, support) with Finance.
prompts: Are licence/support costs budgeted?
Who owns ongoing cost tracking?
Design & Service Setup.riskIfMissing: Unfunded run costs threaten service continuity.

Security, Risk & Compliance.description: Complete DPIA; record risks, mitigations or exemptions.
prompts: Is the DPIA approved and actions tracked?
Any data transfers or special categories involved?

Security, Risk & Compliance.description: Perform CRIS assessment; agree security control set and plan.
prompts: Have mandatory controls been applied or risk accepted?
Is a remediation plan in place?
Are baselines hardened and patched?
Have vulnerabilities been addressed?

Security, Risk & Compliance.description: Define, test, and sign off access controls.
prompts: Are least-privilege and break-glass controls implemented?
Is access recertification defined?

Configuration & Documentation.description: Create the Application Service record in CMDB (e.g., ServiceNow).
prompts: Has the service record been created with correct CI relationships?
Is the service owner assigned in CMDB?
Configuration & Documentation.riskIfMissing: Inaccurate routing and poor support visibility.

Configuration & Documentation.description: Submit CMDB forms and verify configuration data accuracy.
prompts: Are CIs and relationships up to date?
Are discovery and reconciliations passing?
Configuration & Documentation.riskIfMissing: Broken incident routing and change impact analysis.

Configuration & Documentation.description: Draft SDP (overview, components, dependencies, support scope, SLAs, DR/BCP).
prompts: Does the draft SDP cover components, SLAs and DR/BCP?
Who reviews and approves the draft?
Configuration & Documentation.riskIfMissing: Stakeholders lack a coherent view of the service design.

Configuration & Documentation.description: Incorporate build/test outputs (incl. DR, CRIS, DPIA); secure stakeholder approval.
prompts: Does the final SDP include all approvals and test evidence?
Is the document stored and version controlled?
Configuration & Documentation.riskIfMissing: Lack of authoritative reference for BAU and audit.

Configuration & Documentation.description: Ensure IT Service Catalogue, KB articles, and documentation are up to date.
prompts: Are request models and KBs published?
Do docs reflect the final design and support model?
Configuration & Documentation.riskIfMissing: Users and support teams lack accurate guidance.

Testing & Assurance.description: Finalise and approve Test Strategy/Plans (functional, performance, UAT).
prompts: Are entry/exit criteria defined?
Is non-functional testing included where needed?
Testing & Assurance.riskIfMissing: Defects escape to production; readiness unclear.

Testing & Assurance.description: Validate infrastructure meets architecture, security, capacity, performance requirements.
prompts: Has infra passed baseline/security checks?
Is capacity/performance validated?

Testing & Assurance.description: Verify operational readiness (monitoring, backup, failover, support processes) for BAU.
prompts: Are monitoring, backup and failover proven?
Are BAU processes exercised successfully?
Testing & Assurance.riskIfMissing: Operational processes fail during incidents or recovery.

Testing & Assurance.description: UAT criteria defined, executed, and signed off.
prompts: Is UAT signed off by business owners?
Have critical defects been resolved or accepted with risk?
Testing & Assurance.riskIfMissing: Solution may not meet user needs or readiness thresholds.

Testing & Assurance.description: Run all tests, resolve defects, issue Test Completion Report.
prompts: Is a final test summary available with pass/fail and defects?
Are outstanding risks clearly communicated?
Testing & Assurance.riskIfMissing: Lack of evidence for acceptance decisions.

Testing & Assurance.description: If applicable, execute DR exercise or tabletop; document outcomes and improvements.
prompts: Have DR scenarios been tested satisfactorily?
Are actions captured and owned?
Testing & Assurance.riskIfMissing: Inability to recover within RTO/RPO targets.

Testing & Assurance.description: IT Service Continuity testing completed and documented (where required).
prompts: Were continuity scenarios validated?
Are fallback and comms procedures proven?
Testing & Assurance.riskIfMissing: Unclear recovery approach across service components.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Names and availability confirmed for BAU support.
prompts: Are resolver groups and owners confirmed?
Is rota/coverage in place?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Support gaps at go‑live; increased MTTR.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Training identified and planned for BAU teams.
prompts: Are training sessions scheduled?
Is hands‑on access available pre‑go‑live?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Teams are not prepared to support incidents or changes.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Complete KT to BAU; update user guides, ops guides, runbooks.
prompts: Are runbooks and known errors complete?
Have shadowing sessions been held?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Slow incident resolution and inconsistent operations.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Process owners engaged (INC, PRB, CHG, KNO, etc.).
prompts: Are process owners ready for onboarding?
Are CAB/incident bridges arranged?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Uncoordinated processes lead to outages and change failures.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Internal ITSM tooling configured and assessed.
prompts: Are routing, SLAs, and CMDB ready?
Are dashboards and reports in place?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Operational noise and SLA breaches due to misconfiguration.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Third‑party ITSM integration and routing confirmed.
prompts: Is ticket exchange/escalation working with vendors?
Are incident priorities and SLAs aligned?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Slow vendor handoffs and lost tickets.

Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.description: Helpdesk and resolver teams briefed and prepared.
prompts: Do frontline teams have scripts and escalation paths?
Has the comms pack been issued?
Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer.riskIfMissing: Inconsistent user experience and longer MTTR.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Confirm licence inventory; ensure ongoing OPEX approved/funded.
prompts: Are licences reconciled to usage?
Is ongoing OPEX approved by Finance?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Compliance issues or funding gaps post go‑live.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Create/update service request forms; populate Service Catalogue with final data.
prompts: Are request models approved and published?
Is fulfilment routing tested?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Users unable to find or request the service correctly.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Raise go-live change (e.g., ServiceNow) and obtain CAB approval.
prompts: Has the go‑live change met entry criteria?
Are backout plans and comms attached?

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Send go-live notifications; arrange Virtual Support Desk if high impact.
prompts: Are stakeholder comms scheduled and approved?
Is a VSD/bridge arranged if needed?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Stakeholders unprepared; high volume of unmanaged issues.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Confirm support model (RACI, knowledge, processes) is live and accepted by BAU.
prompts: Has BAU accepted the handover?
Are resolver groups and OLAs active from day one?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Service is not supportable post go‑live.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Engagement routes, handoffs, and escalation paths created.
prompts: Are OLAs and escalation paths documented?
Are 3rd‑party engagements defined?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Incidents are routed incorrectly; slow resolution.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Routing tested in SM tooling; all support teams sign-off.
prompts: Has end‑to‑end incident routing been tested?
Are comms trees and escalations verified?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Live incidents stall or bounce, causing SLA breaches.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Agree ELS entry/exit criteria; controlled exit to BAU after warranty.
prompts: Are ELS criteria and duration agreed?
Is the transition to steady state planned?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Premature or prolonged ELS impacting BAU workload.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Set up Hypercare queue for elevated user queries/issues.
prompts: Is a dedicated queue/bridge in place?
Are roles and SLAs defined for Hypercare?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: User issues overwhelm BAU; poor service perception.

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Complete and submit SAF confirming operational readiness and acceptance.
prompts: Is the SAF signed by all stakeholders?
Is supporting evidence attached?

Handover, Go-Live & Support.description: Formal acceptance from key stakeholders that service meets all criteria.
prompts: Have all acceptance criteria been met?
Are any risks/waivers documented?
Handover, Go-Live & Support.riskIfMissing: Ambiguous ownership and unresolved risks at go‑live.

Post-Go-Live / Continuous Improvement.description: Conduct PIR; document performance vs. criteria and lessons learned.
prompts: Have actions from PIR been raised and owned?
What improvements are prioritised for the next release?
Post-Go-Live / Continuous Improvement.riskIfMissing: Issues repeat; missed opportunities to improve service.

prompts: Are alert thresholds tuned to reduce noise?
Are dashboards and runbooks linked?

Post-Go-Live / Continuous Improvement.description: Ensure approvals and funding for licences/OPEX remain in place.
prompts: Are renewals tracked and budgeted?
Is usage reconciled to licences?
Post-Go-Live / Continuous Improvement.riskIfMissing: Compliance or cost surprises post go‑live.
